resources.string: Steps for getting daisy 3 books on sdcard: 1. Create a directory /sdcard/daisy3 2. Copy the DAISY3 book (which is itself a directory) inside daisy3 directory. 3. Thus a DAISY3 book will reside as: /sdcard/daisy3/Sample_Book, where "Sample_Book" is a directory representing a DAISY3 book.
